Evidence builder

This page is a work in progress. I publish this intermediate version to demonstrate the purpose and to recruit both data curators and front-end devs. Shown here: two randomly chosen coding variants in DDX58. Top - protein-coding functional data with coding positions, bottom - transcript sequence data with genomic coordinates, GRCh37. Blue dotted lines indicate the variants of interest. The canonical transcript ENST00000379883.2 is indicated by the green diamond. Protein annotations match that of Uniprot:ENST00000379883; ENSP00000369213; ENSG00000107201 [O95786-1]. The variant tables lists gnomAD data for the variants of interest. To come: hover tip annotations for all positions, browsable variant positions, and link to gene evidence finder and variant evidence finder (i.e. with external links to CliVar, ClinGen, HGMD, GnomAD, and several common pathogenicity prediction databases).
